name: Dungeon Parkour
description:
This is the first complete game I made :D

Dungeon Parkour is a village themed platformer made for "The second gameshell game jam" . The game is made in PICO-8 Fantasy Console. There are 32 levels in the game, please read the instruction before playing for the best experience.

Control: 

X = jump

C = place a bomb

left_arrow = left

right_arrow = right

up_arrow = talk to villagers

down_arrow = close dialogue

Please REPORT any other BUGS

How to play:

To talk to the villagers, walk to them and when the up_arrow icon is shown above the player, press the up_arrow to see the villager's dialogue.

You will AUTOMATICALLY JUMP AFTER CLIMBING TO THE TOP OF THE LADDER!

You will DIE after touching any SPIKES, LAVA, FALLING SAND STONE, or LOSING ALL 3 HEALTH

You can only proceed to the next level after collecting all the coins, the door will open automatically after there is no more coins left.

HAVE FUN
